description:
A spare pair of socks to work with the Lenz Heat Sock battery-powered heated sock system. The updated 5.1 version has an improved fit and additional elasticity. This slim fit version is ideal for narrower feet.

  • Socks are made of thick blend of synthetics, merino and silk that wicks moisture well
  • Integrated heating element wraps tops and bottoms of toes for complete cozy warmth
  • Ergonomic shape works inside most winter boots
  • Padding on the shins adds comfort for hiking and skiing
  • Soft toe seams
  • Socks only. Battery sold separately
name: Lenz 5.1 Slimfit Heat Socks - Unisex
